text: he eemaan vaalo! tumhaare lie haî€¼laal (vaidh) nahin ki balapoorvak striyon ke vaaris ban jao[1] tatha unhen isalie na roko ki unhen jo diya ho, usamen se kuchh maar lo. parantu ye ki khulee buraee kar jaayen tatha unake saath uchit[2] vyavahaar se raho. phir yadi ve tumhen apriy lagen, to sambhav hai ki tum kisee cheez ko apriy samajho aur allaah ne usamen badee bhalaee[3] rakh dee ho
